section.title: Kup wydanie w twardej okładce w języku angielskim
section.para: The paperback is available through Lulu's print-on-demand service at a price of €44.90 (without VAT and shipping). Click here to view the book details on Lulu.com. Click on the button below to buy it directly.

section.title: Pobierz wersję elektroniczną
section.para: Elektroniczna wersja książki (ang. e-book) jest dostępna w trzech formatach plikowych (PDF, EPUB, Mobipocket) i w różnych językach narodowych.

The book is freely available because we want everybody to benefit from it. That said maintaining it for each new Debian release takes time and lots of effort, and we appreciate being thanked for this. If you find this book valuable, please consider contributing to its continued maintenance either by buying a paperback copy or by making a donation via the form below (after having completed your donation, you will be automatically directed to the download page).
Wybierz swój wkład w rozwój książki:

You can also directly download the book on this page. In that case, we hope that you will contribute to the book's success by spreading the word around you. Of course, you can always come back later to make a donation.

section.title: Pobierz książkę
section.para: Książka jest dostępna w trzech formatach plikowych i w różnych językach narodowych (zobacz inne zakładki tłumaczeń).

The PDF format is the document corresponding to the printed book. It's not suitable for reading on small screens. The EPUB format is the recommended format if your reading devices supports it (most smartphones and many ebook readers do support it). The Mobipocket format is mainly for ebook readers that do not support EPUB (like the Kindle).
